Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Package com.nxp.id.jcopx

Interface Summary
ECPoint The interface ECPoint defines and provides methods that can be used to generate Java Card objects that implement JCOP specific EC algorithms.
RSAPrivateCrtKeyX RSAPrivateCrtKeyX is an extension of RSAPrivateCrtKey class which also allows the setting of the public exponent.
RSAPrivateKeyX RSAPrivateKeyX is an extension of RSAPrivateKey class which also allows the setting of the public exponent.
 

Class Summary
BACAccelerator Deprecated. Interface covered now by the SACAccelerator class using the protocol type SM_3DES_CBC_CBC.
CipherX CipherX defines static methods that can be used to generate Java Card objects that implement JCOP-specific cipher objects.
ConstantX ConstantX contains the values of JCOPX constants like secure boolean values.
DESFire This class allows to execute DESFireTM commands from an applet.
ECPointBuilder ECPointBuilder builds an ECPoint object
FIPS FIPS is a JCOP proprietary extension for executing and checking FIPS self-tests by an applet, after power-up.
IOConfigX Class to configure the IO resources from a Java Card applet
IOControlX Class to control the IO resources from a Java Card applet
KeyAgreementX The class ConstantX defines static methods that can be used to generate Java Card objects that implement JCOP specific key agreement algorithms.
KeyBuilderX The KeyBuilderX class is a JCOP proprietary extension to the class KeyBuilder.
KeyPairX This class is a container for a key pair (a public key and a private key).
MultiMIFARE MultiMIFARE is a JCOP proprietary extension containing the API to the Multi MIFARE Emulation Framework.
NFCModem NFCModem provides an API to the JCOP proprietary NFC modem functionality
SACAccelerator SACAccelerator may be used by an applet wishing to delegate the handling of entity authentication and APDU security to its associated Security Domain.
SecureBox Secure Box JavaCard implementation to be used by a JavaCard applet.
SignatureX SignatureX defines static methods that can be used to generate Java Card objects that implement JCOP specific signature objects.
UID Class to provide UID functionality.
UtilX UtilX contains several JCOP proprietary helper methods.
 

Exception Summary
BACAcceleratorException Exception class used by the BACAccelerator for BAC compliant secure messaging.
IOConfigException Exception class used by IOConfigX class.
IOControlException Exception class used by IOControlX class.
JCOPXException Generic exception class that is used by features out of NXPs JCOPX package to indicate invalid usage.
SecureBoxException Exception class that is used by SecureBox implementation to indicate invalid usage.
